channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 things to know about Trump's plan to send troops to Portland and Memphis
item.description: President Trump ordered the deployment of troops to Portland and said he's authorized them to use "full force" to curb protests outside ICE facilities...

item.title: Overseas Hong Kong pro-democracy activist Nathan Law denied entry to Singapore
item.description: The activist wanted by the Hong Kong government said he was denied entry to Singapore over the weekend for what he presumes were political reasons.

item.title: The latest on the Michigan church shooting. And, Trump's new plan to end war in Gaza

item.title: Scared of spiders? Some former arachnophobes now are keeping jumping spiders as pets
item.description: The jumping spider pet market is booming, particularly with women. And for many, the journey to spider enthusiast began as an arachnophobe.

item.title: Moldova's pro-EU party wins clear parliamentary majority, defeating pro-Russian groups
item.description: Moldova's pro-Western governing party won a clear parliamentary majority, defeating pro-Russian groups in an election that was widely viewed as a star...

item.title: Army sent to battle fire in Namibia tourist hotspot
item.description: Etosha National Park is home to endangered black rhinos and more than 100 diverse mammal species.

item.title: The Indian superstar whose political rally turned fatal for dozens
item.description: At least 40 people died over the weekend in a crowd crush at a political rally organised by Vijay's party.

item.title: Investigation continues into fatal Michigan church shooting, fire
item.description: Investigators will be back at the scene Monday in Grand Blanc Township, where a shooting and fire at a church left multiple people dead.

item.title: Clint Smith on adapting "How the Word Is Passed" for young readers
item.description: Clint Smith's bestselling book "How the World Is Passed" has been reimagined for a younger audience by Dr. Sonja Cherry-Paul. Smith joins "CBS Morning...

item.title: AI drives interest in blue-collar jobs among Gen Z: "I don't feel threatened"
item.description: "I am very happy doing what I am doing," says one young electrician who pursued a skilled trade as AI disrupts the job market for college grads.

item.title: Death toll rises to four after Michigan church shooting and arson attack
item.description: The attacker drove a vehicle into the church during a service and opened fire, before being killed himself.

item.description: The Spanish area where 230 people were killed in 2024 has been struck again by bad weather.

item.title: South Sudan court rejects ex-VP's bid to halt murder and treason trial
item.description: The special court rules that Riek Machar is not immune from prosecution and it can put him on trial.

item.title: Does homebuying make sense this fall? Pros and cons experts say to know now
item.description: Buying a home could make a lot of sense this fall, but that won't be the case for every buyer.
